https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yYQ90QSdTjJxYHQeFfTmWYSSqIo.jpg Iraq, 2004: during a routine sortie a US patrol is ambushed and the young soldiers are forced to put their training and skills into action fast. A determined foe with superior local knowledge, the Fedayeen insurgents soon draw them into close quarter combat and a desperate fight for survival. American Soldiers
